NEST Secure Outsourcing¶

secout is a library that includes implementation of secure outsourcing algorithms published by Network, Energy, Security, and big daTa (NEST) Group in Case Western Reserve University (CWRU)

This secure outsourcing project implements a number of secure outsourcing algorithms as described in papers 1, 2 and 3.

References¶

1

  1. Salinas, C. Luo, X. Chen, W. Liao and P. Li, “Efficient Secure Outsourcing of Large-Scale Sparse Linear Systems of Equations,” in IEEE Transactions on Big Data, vol. 4, no. 1, pp. 26-39, 1 March 2018. doi: 10.1109/TBDATA.2017.2679760

2

  1. Salinas, C. Luo, W. Liao, and P. Li, “Efficient Secure Outsourcing of Large-scale Quadratic Programs,” in Proceedings of the 11th ACM on Asia Conference on Computer and Communications Security, pp. 281–292, 2016. doi: 10.1145/2897845.2897862

3

  1. Luo, J. Ji, X. Chen, M. Li, L. T. Yang and P. Li, “Parallel Secure Outsourcing of Large-scale Nonlinearly Constrained Nonlinear Programming Problems,” in IEEE Transactions on Big Data. doi: 10.1109/TBDATA.2018.2821195
